VIIII.

To Domitius Apollinaris Pliny writes, v. 6, describing his Tusean villa. In ix. 13, 13 he is spoken of as Consul desigynatus.

To Sextus Erucius Clarus (or it may be to his father, Erucius Clarus) is addressed i. 16. For further details see Mommsen in Keil, p. 409.
